definitions.definition: To scream with a shrill , prolonged sound.
examples: The children squealed with delight while opening their Christmas presents.

definitions.definition: To make a squealing noise. ( of an object )
To give sensitive information about someone to a third party ; to rat on someone.
examples: You'd better not squeal on me to the cops.

main_definition: ( ambitransitive ) To scream with a shrill , prolonged sound.
secondary_definitions: To make a squealing noise. ( of an object )
( intransitive , slang ) To give sensitive information about someone to a third party ; to rat on someone.
